title: Baker's
summary: Save with Baker's! Coupons, ads, rewards & shopping list in one app!
description: Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Baker’s app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Baker’s Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:- Shop ClickList® curbside pickup or delivery right from the app!- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your ClickList® order.- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.- Refill your Baker’s Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.- Check your fuel points.- Use our locator to find the closest Baker’s store or fuel center.- View your purchase history. Use it to create standard orders that will save you time.- Save BIG with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards.To use the Baker’s app, you'll need a Baker’s digital account. You can register for your account and link your Shopper’s Card through the app. If you don't have a Shopper’s Card, you can create one when you register to access all of these savings and rewards!
descriptionHTML:
Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Baker’s app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Baker’s Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:

- Shop ClickList® curbside pickup or delivery right from the app!

- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your ClickList® order.

- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.

- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.

- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.

- Refill your Baker’s Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.

- Check your fuel points.

- Use our locator to find the closest Baker’s store or fuel center.

- View your purchase history. Use it to create standard orders that will save you time.

- Save BIG with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards.

To use the Baker’s app, you'll need a Baker’s digital account. You can register for your account and link your Shopper’s Card through the app. If you don't have a Shopper’s Card, you can create one when you register to access all of these savings and rewards!
comments: Cannot see complete weekly ad on Note 8
I only downloaded the app to STOP the add from popping up every 15min

App would not take my Bakers card information even after calling customer service and waiting on hold for 20 minutes. Very disappointed. Will be using a different store to shop online for groceries from now on.
Surprisingly pretty decent app. Nice job Baker's Devs.
recentChanges: Great news! 13.5 of the app is now available for download. We’ve added new features and enhancements to make your mobile experience even better!
• Receive push notifications for your ClickList® orders
• Print your Cart or Shopping Lists directly from the app
Plus some minor bug fixes and other great enhancements!
